data.title: Flying J Cardlock in Yorkton, SK
data.meta_description: Visit Flying J Cardlock #844 in Yorkton, SK, for gas and diesel fuel, showers and restrooms, food, and truck parking.
data.text:
Showers can only be reserved when you are on the store’s property. To check the availability of showers at Flying J Cardlock, Yorkton, SK you can, simply use your myRewards Plus app. Navigate to the “Find” tab located at the bottom left of your screen and choose your destination. Then, scroll down to “Reserve a shower” to see available showers at Flying J Cardlock, Yorkton, SK.

To capture every reward point from all purchases at Flying J Cardlock, Yorkton, SK, easily add receipts to your myRewards account. In the app, tap the top left menu and select "Receipts." Choose "Request Missed Points" to either take a photo of your receipt or enter the details manually. Only transactions from the last 7 days are eligible. Once verified, your points will be added!

To see if Flying J Cardlock, Yorkton, SK, offers truck care or roadside assistance, go to your myRewards Plus app, click on the “Find” tab in the bottom left corner. Select your desired location and scroll until you find “Southern Tire Mart.” There you can click “Call for Assistance” to contact the truck care line.

To find out if Flying J Cardlock, Yorkton, SK, provides DOT inspections, go to your myRewards Plus app. Click on the “Find” tab at the bottom left of your screen and select your destination. Then, scroll down to locate “Southern Tire Mart”. Stores featuring Southern Tire Marts offer DOT inspections.

Click here. This action prompts you to provide the email linked to your myRewards account. Following this, an email will be sent to you with detailed instructions on how to complete the final steps.
